Description: You fire a barrage of sharp shurikens at a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing water damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another shuriken strikes the target for an additional water damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits. BBC
